message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product which I believe you'll find valuable. I think $14,000 is a fair price, considering its worth. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I'm hoping to keep my spending within $12,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $12,000 is significantly below its value.  Would you consider meeting me halfway at $13,000?
I'm sorry, Alice, but I still can't meet your price of $13,000. Considering the value of the product, I'd like to propose $12,500. Is this feasible?
